text: Professor Martin Dülfer from Dresden (1908) Martin Dülfer (1 January 1859, in Breslau – 21 December 1942, in Dresden) was a German architect. He taught as a professor at the Technische Hochschule Dresden (1906-1929). ==Works== * The Stadttheater (City theatre) in Meran, Italy (1900) * A theatre in Dortmund, Germany (1904) * A theatre in Lübeck, Germany (1908) * A theatre in Duisburg, Germany (1911-1912) Theater Duisburg: Die Geschichte des Theaters * Reconstructed the Bulgarian National Theatre in Sofia (1929) ==References== Category:19th-century German architects Category:History of Munich Category:1859 births Category:1942 deaths Category:20th-century German architects
title: Martin Dülfer
